name: Instagram Guide
primary_goal_vibe: Curated education, evergreen discovery, and structured storytelling through collections of existing posts.
tone_preference: Helpful, authoritative, and clearly structured. More editorial than conversational, but still accessible.

copy_guidelines.copy_best_practices: The guide title must clearly communicate the benefit or outcome. The introduction should set expectations about what the user will learn or find inside. Each entry should add context to the original post rather than repeat it.
copy_guidelines.caption_structure_hint: Title: benefit-driven and explicit. Intro: 2–4 short lines explaining what the guide includes and who it is for. Entry descriptions: 1–2 concise lines adding context or takeaway.
copy_guidelines.recommended_caption_length: Medium. Enough to establish authority without overwhelming.
cta_examples: Share this guide with your team
Follow the guide from start to finish

entry_description_guidelines.primary_role: Frame each included post with added meaning, sequence, or practical application.
best_practices: Avoid repeating the original caption verbatim
Explain why this post is included in the guide
Maintain a logical progression across entries

hashtags_mentions.recommended_hashtags: Minimal. Use only 2–4 category-level hashtags if needed.
hashtags_mentions.hashtag_strategy: Guides are not primarily discovery-driven via hashtags. Rely more on profile traffic and cross-promotion.
hashtags_mentions.mention_strategy: Tag creators, partners, or brands only when they are central to the guide’s content.

technical_constraints.entry_limit_behavior: Guides are built from existing posts; performance depends on the quality and relevance of those assets.
technical_constraints.cover_image_behavior: The guide cover should be visually clean and clearly reflect the guide topic.
technical_constraints.update_note: Guides can be edited and expanded over time to stay evergreen.

required_elements: Clear guide title with a defined outcome
At least one clear CTA to save or follow
disallowed_practices: Unstructured post collections with no narrative logic
Repeating original captions without added context
Overloading the guide with unrelated topics
